attributes.action: Raise money to chip in for Jurgen Klopps ban by the FA! Taking passion away!!!!!
attributes.background: Jurgens celebration has been charged by the FA after winning a Mesryside derby match in amazing style. The FA are greedy, money grabbing and are trying to rip the passion out of football. No matter what team you support, you see the emotion and passion in that Klopp does. Disgusting by the FA.
